children.name: location

parameters.name: location `Array|kendo.dataviz.map.Location`
parameters.description: The marker location on the map. Coordinates are listed as `[Latitude, Longitude]`.

children.description: Gets or sets the Marker location.

children.name: tooltip.showOn
children.description: The event on which the tooltip will be shown. Predefined values are "mouseenter", "click" and "focus".

children.name: tooltip.showAfter
children.description: Specify the delay in milliseconds before the tooltip is shown. This option is ignored if showOn is set to "click" or "focus".

children.name: tooltip.position
children.description: The position relative to the target element, at which the tooltip will be shown. Predefined values are "bottom", "top", "left", "right", "center".

children.name: tooltip.width
children.description: The width (in pixels) of the tooltip.

children.name: tooltip.height
children.description: The height (in pixels) of the tooltip.

children.name: tooltip.iframe
children.description: Explicitly states whether content iframe should be created.

children.name: tooltip.callout
children.description: Specifies if the tooltip callout will be displayed.

children.name: tooltip.template
children.description: The [template](/api/framework/kendo#methods-template) which renders the tooltip content.The fields which can be used in the template are:* location - the marker location (`kendo.dataviz.map.Location` instance)* marker - the marker instance> Setting a template disables the content option.

children.name: tooltip.content.url
children.description: Specifies a URL or request options that the tooltip should load its content from.>Note: For URLs starting with a protocol (e.g. http://),a container iframe element is automatically created. This behavior may change in futureversions, so it is advisable to always use the [iframe configuration option](#iframe).

children.name: tooltip.content
children.description: The text or a function which result will be shown within the tooltip.By default the tooltip will display the target element title attribute content.

children.name: tooltip.animation.open.duration
children.description: Defines the animation duration.

children.name: tooltip.animation.open.effects
children.description: Effect to be used for opening of the Tooltip.

children.name: tooltip.animation.open
children.description: The animation that will be used when a Tooltip opens.

children.name: tooltip.animation.close.duration
children.description: Defines the animation duration.

children.name: tooltip.animation.close.effects
children.description: Effect to be used for closing of the tooltip.

children.name: tooltip.animation.close
children.description: The animation that will be used when a Tooltip closes.

children.name: tooltip.animation
children.description: A collection of {Animation} objects, used to change default animations. A value of **false**will disable all animations in the widget.

children.name: tooltip.autoHide
children.description: Specifies if the tooltip will be hidden when mouse leaves the target element. If set to false a close button will be shown within tooltip. If set to false, showAfter is specified and the showOn is set to "mouseenter" the Tooltip will be displayed after the given timeout even if the element is no longer hovered.

children.name: tooltip
children.description: Kendo UI Tooltip options for this marker.

children.name: title
children.description: The marker title. Displayed as browser tooltip.

children.name: shape
children.description: The marker shape. The following pre-defined marker shapes are available:* pinTarget* pinMarker shapes are implemented as CSS classes on the marker element (span.k-marker).For example "pinTarget" is rendered as "k-marker-pin-target".

children.name: location
children.description: The marker location on the map. Coordinates are listed as `[Latitude, Longitude]`.
